relation: A whole ton of them live in your basement. Be careful. Their bite is worse than their bark. Well, 'squeak', technically...
Children, sharing a warm embrace with their mother.

A picture of the very first serious Earthbound drawing I made, unshaded. I put shading on the original, but decided I should have it scanned before I did that. I lost the file for a long time, but I finally found it again. Thought it'd be cool to show it off here. Enjoy!
Made for that fanart contest thing that was going on, but I was just a little too late getting it in.
